name: Sheep in Love
storyline:
This is a big day for Shaun and Shiela the loving and loveable. They are starting their new life as a married couple. They are living free but sometimes they get in trouble.
They need your help to make sure there is no impossible.
summary: Sheep in Love is a unique puzzle game with addictive gameplay. It's easy to pick-up and learn, but it will give your brain a workout as you advance to the more difficult levels. Guide your hero to his love by sliding the tiles!
